column4: I spoke too soon, I can boot, but my partitions are marked read only, so there's still something wrong.
where do I start to figure out why my file systems are booting read only?
yes, it boots now that i uninstalled evms, but the root file system (ext3 on a single drive) is booting read only, so the system is pretty fubar
let's have a look at your /etc/fstab -- can you use the pastebin and paste it in?
